issue.title: [C++] Make internal structure of comparison functions consistent
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15396](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15396). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Make Between, Greater, Less and other comparison functions have a consistent internal structure. This will ease maintenance and improve code readability.
